item.title: 与会代表称 "欧佩克+"有望坚持暂停石油生产
item.description: 三位代表说，在全球石油供应过剩迹象日益严重的情况下，预计欧佩克+将在本周末举行的会议上坚持暂停产量的计划。【原文：OPEC+ is expected to stick with a planned output pause when it meets this weekend, amid growing signs of global oil oversupply, three delegates said.】

item.title: 克罗格交易受挫后，Ocado 终止排他性条款
item.description: Ocado Group Plc 与美国克罗格公司（Kroger Co.【原文：Ocado Group Plc has ended exclusive arrangements to supply its automated grocery warehouse technology as investor pressure grows following setbacks to its partnership with Kroger Co. in the US.】

item.title: 由 Baillie 掌管的英国信托公司要求澄清萨巴公司推翻董事会一事
item.description: 爱丁堡全球投资信托公司（Edinburgh Worldwide Investment Trust Plc）向激进对冲基金萨巴资本管理公司（Saba Capital Management）施压，要求该公司更明确地说明，在不到一年前的一次类似行动失败后，萨巴资本管理公司再次发起了推翻这家伦敦上市基金董事会的运动。【原文：Edinburgh Worldwide Investment Trust Plc pressed activist hedge fund Saba Capital Management to give more clarity on its renewed campaign to oust the board of the London-listed fund, after a similar failed move less than a year ago.】

item.title: 尽管跌幅达 80%，韩国人仍坚守以太币囤积者 BitMine
item.description: 以太币囤积者比特矿沉浸技术公司（BitMine Immersion Technologies Inc.【原文：Ether hoarder BitMine Immersion Technologies Inc. is set to close the year as one of the most popular overseas stocks in South Korea, even after a steep decline from a July peak.】

item.title: 西班牙通胀率为 3% 支持欧洲央行维持利率设定
item.description: 西班牙的通货膨胀率在 12 月份有所下降，但仍远高于欧元区的平均水平，这为欧洲中央银行维持利率不变提供了支持。【原文：Spanish inflation eased in December but remained well above the euro-area average, supporting the case for the European Central Bank to keep interest rates unchanged.】

item.title: 日本 Topix 指数年终收盘创历史新高，超过 1989 年的水平
item.description: 日本基准 Topix 指数创下了 2025 年的年终最高纪录，甚至超过了 36 年前泡沫经济时期的最高纪录。【原文：Japan’s benchmark Topix index closed at a record year-end high for 2025, surpassing even the peak 36 years ago reached during the infamous bubble economy.】

item.title: 泰铢走强、战争加剧对中国的担忧，泰国旅游业受到冲击
item.description: 泰国以美食和狂野的夜生活而闻名，但在多重危机打击了度假者的信心之后，泰国的游客人数将出现十年来首次年度下降。【原文：Thailand, famed for its fantastic food and wild nightlife, is poised for its first annual drop in tourist arrivals in a decade outside the pandemic, after multiple crises hurt the confidence of holidaymakers.】

item.title: 欧洲银行股迎来王牌年，但诺和诺德与彪马输掉了比赛
item.description: 在这个创纪录的一年里，金属价格的飙升和大规模国防开支的承诺提振了欧洲股市。但是，银行股却抢尽了风头，强劲的涨势让分析师们相信，这股涨势将延续到 2026 年。【原文：Surging metals prices and the promise of massive defense spending boosted European stocks in this record-setting year. But it was banks that stole the show, with a powerful rally that analysts are confident will extend into 2026.】

item.title: 拉布布需求担忧再起，Pop Mart 股价下跌
item.description: Pop Mart International Group Ltd 的股价创下三周来最大跌幅，此前有媒体报道称，转售商对其 Labubu 玩具的需求减弱，这打击了投资者的情绪。【原文：Pop Mart International Group Ltd shares slid the most in three weeks after media reports of waning reseller demand for its Labubu toys dented investor sentiment.】

item.title: 印尼股市将迎来 2014 年以来散户资金流入最多的一年
item.description: 印尼股市有望创下 11 年来的最佳表现，因为当地散户投资者的不断增加足以抵消国外资金的外流。【原文：Indonesian stocks are poised for their best performance in 11 years, as the growing presence of local retail investors more than offset foreign fund outflows.】

item.title: 俄罗斯输往印度的石油量下降，但信实公司可能会限制下降幅度
item.description: 本月流入印度的俄罗斯原油量有望创下三年来的最低水平，不过在信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）恢复采购后，明年初的原油量可能会有所上升。【原文：Russian crude oil flows to India this month are on track to hit the lowest level in three years, though volumes may rise early next year after Reliance Industries Ltd. resumed purchases.】

item.title: 在岸人民币自 2023 年以来首次升破 1 美元兑 7 元人民币
item.description: 在控制更为严格的在岸市场，人民币汇率自 2023 年以来首次突破每美元兑 7 美元的关键水平，表明中国对货币进一步升值感到放心。【原文：The yuan strengthened beyond the key 7-per-dollar level in the more tightly controlled onshore market for the first time since 2023, signaling China’s comfort with further currency appreciation.】

item.title: 保加利亚的重要欧元时刻因政治动荡而黯然失色
item.description:
该国将于1月1日加入单一货币，但跛脚鸭政府、另一场大选迫在眉睫，近一半的人希望保留列弗。【原文：

The country joins the single currency on Jan. 1 with a lame duck government, another election looming and almost half of people wanting to keep the lev.

】

item.title: 人工智能内存需求推动 Kioxia 成为全球表现最好的股票
item.description: 人工智能对数据存储的贪得无厌让日本存储芯片制造商 Kioxia Holdings Corp. 的股价在今年取得了举世瞩目的涨幅，这表明，尽管近期市场动荡不安，但人工智能热潮依然生机勃勃。【原文：Artificial intelligence’s insatiable appetite for data storage has delivered Japanese memory chipmaker Kioxia Holdings Corp. world-beating stock gains this year, a sign that the AI boom is alive and well despite recent market jitters.】

item.title: 承认吧，你正在与人工智能谈恋爱
item.description: 阿米莉亚-米勒（Amelia Miller）有一张不同寻常的名片。当我在最近的一次科技活动中看到 "人类-人工智能关系教练 "这个头衔时，我以为她是在利用聊天机器人恋情的兴起，让那些奇怪的联系变得更加牢固。结果恰恰相反。人工智能工具正在巧妙地操纵着人们，取代了他们向他人寻求建议的需求。这对人与人之间的真实关系产生了不利影响。【原文：Amelia Miller has an unusual business card. When I saw the title of “Human-AI Relationship Coach” at a recent technology event, I presumed she was capitalizing on the rise of chatbot romances to make those strange bonds stronger. It turned out the opposite was true. Artificial intelligence tools were subtly manipulating people and displacing their need to ask others for advice. That was having a detrimental impact on real relationships with humans.】

item.title: 印尼计划减产，镍创九个月新高
item.description: 在头号生产国印度尼西亚表示计划削减供应以提振价格后，镍创下了自 3 月份以来的最高点。【原文：Nickel hit the highest since March after top producer Indonesia flagged plans to cut supply in order to boost prices.】

item.title: 资本主义与犯罪让我度过这一年的书籍
item.description:
这是一份冷眼阅读清单。【原文：

Here’s one cold-eyed reading list.

】

item.title: 克莱尔称 2025 年全球液化天然气出口量创三年来最大增幅
item.description: 随着北美新供应的上线，2025 年全球液化天然气出口量可能出现三年来最大的增长。【原文：Global exports of liquefied natural gas in 2025 likely saw the biggest jump in three years, as new supply came online in North America.】

item.title: 牛市掌舵，铜价创 2017 年以来最长涨势
item.description: 在 12 月份的反弹中，铜价创下 2017 年以来最长的上涨周期，其动力来自供应链面临更大压力的前景。【原文：Copper headed for the longest winning run since 2017 in a December rally powered by the prospect of more stress in the supply chain.】

item.title: 孟加拉国民主力量卡莉达-齐亚逝世，享年 80 岁
item.description: 孟加拉国前总理卡莉达-齐亚（Khaleda Zia）逝世，她在动荡的军事统治时期之后帮助孟加拉国迎来了民主，并主导该国政治长达数十年之久。她享年 80 岁。【原文：Khaleda Zia, the former prime minister of Bangladesh who helped usher in democracy after a tumultuous period of military rule and who dominated the country’s politics for decades, has died. She was 80.】

item.title: 越南 GSM 考虑海外上市，希望市值达到 200 亿美元
item.description: 越南首富控股的越南电动汽车出租车运营商 Green & Smart Mobility JSC 正在考虑进行国际首次公开募股，该公司的估值可能达到约 200 亿美元。【原文：Vietnamese electric-vehicle taxi operator Green & Smart Mobility JSC, which is owned by the country’s richest man, is weighing an international initial public offering that could value the company at about $20 billion.】

item.title: 投资者因印度央行利率前景而涌入印度短债市场
item.description: 债券套利交易试图从低融资成本和高债券收益率之间的差距中获利，这种交易在印度越来越受欢迎，市场观察家预计明年这种策略仍将流行。【原文：Bond carry trades, which seek to profit from the gap between low funding costs and high bond yields, are growing ever more popular in India and market watchers expect the strategy to remain in vogue next year.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚将最低工资上调 23% 引发通胀担忧
item.description: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）宣布，哥伦比亚明年将把最低月工资提高 23%，以帮助该国最贫困的工人。但这一措施也激起了人们对通货膨胀的担忧，可能会迫使中央银行提高利率。【原文：Colombia will increase the monthly minimum wage by 23% next year, President Gustavo Petro announced in a push to help the country’s poorest workers. But the measure also stokes inflation concerns that could pressure the central bank to raise interest rates.】

item.title: 马来西亚前总理穆希丁辞去反对党联盟主席职务
item.description: 马来西亚前总理穆希丁-亚辛（Muhyiddin Yassin）将辞去国民阵线（Perikatan Nasional）反对党联盟主席一职，并于 1 月 1 日生效。【原文：Former Malaysian Prime Minister Muhyiddin Yassin will resign as chairman of the Perikatan Nasional opposition alliance effective Jan. 1.】

item.title: LG 推出受三星启发的艺术品电视，加入热门产品行列
item.description: LG 电子公司模仿竞争对手三星电子公司近年来流行的风格，推出了一款设计类似装裱艺术品的电视机。【原文：LG Electronics Inc. introduced a TV designed to resemble framed artwork, imitating a style that has been popularized by rival Samsung Electronics Co. in recent years.】

item.title: 英国消费者五年来首次削减银行卡支出
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）的数据显示，英国购物者的借记卡和信用卡消费在 2025 年出现了自大流行病以来的首次下降，但数据表明，人们仍然愿意用小奢侈和小体验来犒劳自己。【原文：UK shoppers’ spending on their debit and credit cards dropped in 2025 for the first time since the pandemic, according to Barclays data that nevertheless showed people still willing to treat themselves with small luxuries and experiences.】

item.title: 2025 年伦敦 "股票经纪人带 "房价降幅最大
item.description: 2025 年，伦敦所谓的 "股票经纪人带 "地区的房价跌幅最大，英格兰东南部和首都落后于北部地区。【原文：Pockets of London’s so-called stockbroker belt suffered the biggest house price declines in 2025, as the South East of England and the capital fell behind regions in the north.】

item.title: 人工智能药物公司 Insilico 2.93 亿美元首次公开募股后亮相香港
item.description: 人工智能生物技术公司 Insilico Medicine Cayman TopCo 在首次公开募股中筹集了 2.93 亿美元，将于周二在香港上市。【原文：AI-biotechnology firm Insilico Medicine Cayman TopCo is set to debut in Hong Kong on Tuesday after raising $293 million in its initial public offering.】

item.title: 交易商权衡地缘政治与库存，石油保持涨势
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了从委内瑞拉到俄罗斯和伊朗的地缘政治紧张局势以及对供应过剩的担忧，石油保持了大部分涨幅。【原文：Oil held the bulk of a gain as traders weighed geopolitical tensions from Venezuela to Russia and Iran against concerns about a glut.】

item.title: 白银在经历五年多来最大单日跌幅后保持稳定
item.description: 白银在经历了五年多来的最大单日跌幅后企稳，原因是交易商在年底强劲反弹后获利了结。【原文：Silver steadied after its biggest one-day drop in more than five years, as traders booked profit following a powerful year-end rally.】
